content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia. Thank you for your interest in our apartment. To begin the negotiation, I have set my initial price at 1200 Euro per month. What rental amount do you have in mind?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a bit high for a one-bedroom apartment. I would say 900 Euro per month would be more reasonable.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I regret but firmly refuse to consider this proposal but but let me try lowering it slightly. I am willing to accept 1150 Euro per month for this apartment in such a prime location. Are you open to discussing further?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, but I think 1000 Euro per month is more reasonable. It's a great apartment, but I'm looking for something a bit more affordable.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I am reluctant to go any lower than my current offer of 1150 Euro, as it already represents a concession. Unfortunately, I do not want to continue the negotiation any further with this significant gap in our positions. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
